summary: The 'Improve Transparency and Stability for Families and Children Act' (H.R. 2359) amends part A of title IV of the Social Security Act. It establishes deadlines for states to obligate and expend funds received under the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) block grant program. The bill also allows states to set aside a limited percentage of funds for future use, and requires notification to the Secretary of the intention to do so. The amendment is set to take effect on October 1, 2026.
